456650.name: Kewtia: Crystallite Hunt
456650.description:
Kewtia: Crystallite Hunt is a colorful 3D Platformer packed full of levels, playable characters, and boss fights!
Explore the Mattyverse in a big easter egg hunt as you collect Crystallites; strange objects full of energy created by the Kewtians!

Features

  • Colorful 3D platforming with fun physics and sandbox elements
  • Tons of large, varied levels to explore
  • Lots of collectibles and unlocks
  • Many playable characters, with different abilities and stats
  • Characters and environments from all across the Mattyverse, which includes games like Super Gear Quest, Geneticognito, and Toadie's Adventure
  • Tons of boss fights
  • Future content updates
